EmailTemplate.name: Ticket - Feature Request Status Change
EmailTemplate.subject: The status of your HIVE feature request ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Summary__c} has changed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.CreatedBy},
The status of your HIVE feature request {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Summary__c} has changed to status {!Case.Status}.
Please refer to the below list of possible status values and their definitions for further information.
- New A new ticket has been created and added to our HIVE new feature request ticket queue.
- Waiting for Feedback A HIVE Product Owner will reach out to you via HIVE chatter or in person to clarify open questions.
- Added to Product Backlog Your user story / stories have been added to the product backlog and are awaiting prioritization for sprint planning through the HIVE Product Manager.
- Deployed to Production Your user story / stories have been successfully depoyed to HIVE production and are ready to be used - yeah!
- Rejected Your HIVE Feature Request has been rejected. Please refer to the Rejection Reason field in the ticket for any details.
For any questions please feel free to use our HIVE chatter group directly in the ticket.
Thanks, Your HIVE Team
